title: $:/litClock/times/-18:57-Virginia Woolf
quote_first: Folded in this triple melody, the audience sat gazing; and beheld gently and approvingly without interrogation, for it seemed inevitable, a box tree in a green tub take the place of the ladiesâ€™ dressing-room; while on what seemed to be a wall, was hung a great clock face; the hands pointing to
quote_time_case: three minutes to the hour; which was seven
